chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
y: SF_seq
x: SF_seq

Goal:
last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y)

Premises:
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_lx = fun s : SF_seq => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : SF_seq -> seq R
SF_h = fun s : SF_seq => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : SF_seq -> R
SF_cat = fun x y : SF_seq => {| SF_h := SF_h x; SF_t := SF_t x ++ SF_t y |} : SF_seq -> SF_seq -> SF_seq
SF_lx_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y)
seq_step_cat : forall x y : seq R, (0 < size x)%nat -> (0 < size y)%nat -> last 0 x = head 0 y -> seq_step (x ++ behead y) = Rmax (seq_step x) (seq_step y)
SF_cons = fun (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := fst h; SF_t := (SF_h s, snd h) :: SF_t s |} : R * T -> SF_seq -> SF_seq
SF_rev = fun s : SF_seq => SF_make (rev (SF_lx s)) (rev (SF_ly s)) (SF_rev_0 s) : SF_seq -> SF_seq
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)
Rmax_assoc : forall x y z : R, Rmax x (Rmax y z) = Rmax (Rmax x y) z
SF_size_lx : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (SF_size s)
SF_lx_rev : forall s : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_rev s) = rev (SF_lx s)
SF_size_lx_ly : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (size (SF_ly s))
SF_seq_bij : forall s : SF_seq, SF_make (SF_lx s) (SF_ly s) (SF_size_lx_ly s) = s
last_rev : forall (x0 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), last x0 (rev l) = head x0 l where ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
head_rev : forall (x0 : ?T) (l : seq ?T), head x0 (rev l) = last x0 l where ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_rev_0 : forall s : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s)))
last_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), last x (s1 ++ s2) = last (last x s1) s2
last_cons : forall (T : Type) (x y : T) (s : seq T), last x (y :: s) = last y s
SF_lx_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * T), SF_lx (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_lx s) (fst h)
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x0, y0) s) where ?S : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
last_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T) (z : T), last x (rcons s z) = z
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
head_rcons : forall (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), head x0 (rcons s t) = head t s where ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
nth_last : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s (Init.Nat.pred (size s)) = last x0 s
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
head_map : forall (f : ?T1 -> ?T2) (s : seq ?T1) (x0 : ?T1), head (f x0) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (head x0 s) where ?T1 : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T2 : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
zip = fun S T : Type => fix zip (s : seq S) (t : seq T) {struct t} : seq (S * T) := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => match t with | [::] => [::] | y :: t' => (x, y) :: zip s' t' end end : forall S T : Type, seq S -> seq T -> seq (S * T) Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope seq_scope]
rev_rev : forall l : seq ?T, rev (rev l) = l where ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_size = fun s : SF_seq => size (SF_t s) : SF_seq -> nat
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
SF_ly = fun s : SF_seq => unzip2 (SF_t s) : SF_seq -> seq T
Z.gt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Z.lt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Lt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
SF_t = fun s : SF_seq => let (_, SF_t) := s in SF_t : SF_seq -> seq (R * T)
last_eq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)) (z x y : eqtype.Equality.sort T), ~~ eqtype.eq_op x y -> ~~ eqtype.eq_op z y -> eqtype.eq_op (last x s) y = eqtype.eq_op (last z s) y
pairmap_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s1 s2 : seq T1), pairmap f x (s1 ++ s2) = pairmap f x s1 ++ pairmap f (last x s1) s2
BinIntDef.Z.succ = fun x : Z => (x + 1)%Z : Z -> Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
SF_rcons = fun (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := rcons (SF_t s) t |} : SF_seq -> R * T -> SF_seq

```coq
intros H.
rewrite (SF_lx_cat _ _).
rewrite (SF_lx_cat _ _).
rewrite (last_cat (SF_h x)).
rewrite (last_cat (SF_h _)).
rewrite (SF_lx_cat).
simpl. rewrite last_rcons. auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros H. rewrite (SF_lx_cat _ _). rewrite (SF_lx_cat _ _). rewrite (last_cat (SF_h x)). rewrite (last_cat (SF_h _)). rewrite (SF_lx_cat). simpl. rewrite last_rcons. auto.
